name: Rime Worm Grub
speed: 30 ft., swim 30 ft, burrow (snow, ice) 20 ft.

traits.name: Born of Rime
traits.desc: A rime worm grub can breathe air or water with equal ease.

traits.name: Ravenous
traits.desc: At the grub stage, the worm is painfully hungry. Rime worm grubs can make opportunity attacks against enemies who disengage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rime worm makes one tendril attack and one gnash attack.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gnash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
